B

bindInstance(Class<T>, T) - Method in class eu.lestard.easydi.EasyDI
This method is used to define an instance that is used every time the given class type is requested.
bindInterface(Class<T>, Class<? extends T>) - Method in class eu.lestard.easydi.EasyDI
This method is used to define what implementing class should be used for a given interface.
bindProvider(Class<T>, Provider<T>) - Method in class eu.lestard.easydi.EasyDI
This method is used to define a Provider for a given type.
